00001 #include "chm_common.h"
00002 #include "Mutils.h"
00003 
00004 cholmod_common c;
00005 
00006 static int stype(int ctype, SEXP x)
00007 {
00008     if ((ctype % 3) == 1) return (*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1;
00009     return 0;
00010 }
00011 
00012 static int xtype(int ctype)
00013 {
00014     switch(ctype / 3) {
00015     case 0: /* "d" */
00016     case 1: /* "l" */
00017         return CHOLMOD_REAL;
00018     case 2: /* "n" */
00019         return CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00020     case 3: /* "z" */
00021         return CHOLMOD_COMPLEX;
00022     }
00023     return -1;
00024 }
00025 
00026 static void *xpt(int ctype, SEXP x)
00027 {
00028     switch(ctype / 3) {
00029     case 0: /* "d" */
00030         return (void *) REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00031     case 1: /* "l" */
00032         return (void *) REAL(coerceVector(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym), REALSXP));
00033     case 2: /* "n" */
00034         return (void *) NULL;
00035     case 3: /* "z" */
00036         return (void *) COMPLEX(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00037     }
00038     return (void *) NULL;       /* -Wall */
00039 }
00040 
00041 Rboolean check_sorted_chm(CHM_SP A)
00042 {
00043     int *Ai = (int*)(A->i), *Ap = (int*)(A->p);
00044     int j, p;
00045 
00046     for (j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) {
00047         int p1 = Ap[j], p2 = Ap[j + 1] - 1;
00048         for (p = p1; p < p2; p++)
00049             if (Ai[p] >= Ai[p + 1])
00050                 return FALSE;
00051     }
00052     return TRUE;
00053 }
00054 
00055 static void chm2Ralloc(CHM_SP dest, CHM_SP src)
00056 {
00057     int np1, nnz;
00058 
00059     /* copy all the characteristics of src to dest */
00060     memcpy(dest, src, sizeof(cholmod_sparse));
00061 
00062     /* R_alloc the vector storage for dest and copy the contents from src */
00063     np1 = src->ncol + 1;
00064     nnz = (int) cholmod_nnz(src, &c);
00065     dest->p = (void*) Memcpy((   int*)R_alloc(sizeof(   int), np1),
00066                              (   int*)(src->p), np1);
00067     dest->i = (void*) Memcpy((   int*)R_alloc(sizeof(   int), nnz),
00068                              (   int*)(src->i), nnz);
00069     dest->x = (void*) Memcpy((double*)R_alloc(sizeof(double), nnz),
00070                              (double*)(src->x), nnz);
00071 }
00072 
00091 CHM_SP as_cholmod_sparse(CHM_SP ans, SEXP x, Rboolean check_Udiag, Rboolean sort_in_place)
00092 {
00093     char *valid[] = {"dgCMatrix", "dsCMatrix", "dtCMatrix",
00094                      "lgCMatrix", "lsCMatrix", "ltCMatrix",
00095                      "ngCMatrix", "nsCMatrix", "ntCMatrix",
00096                      "zgCMatrix", "zsCMatrix", "ztCMatrix",
00097                      ""};
00098     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00099         ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid);
00100     SEXP islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00101 
00102     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_sparse");
00103     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_sparse)); /* zero the struct */
00104 
00105     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_INT;   /* characteristics of the system */
00106     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00107     ans->packed = TRUE;
00108                                 /* slots always present */
00109     ans->i = INTEGER(islot);
00110     ans->p = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym));
00111                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */
00112     ans->nrow = dims[0];
00113     ans->ncol = dims[1];
00114     ans->nzmax = (size_t) ((int *)ans->p)[dims[1]];
00115     /* == LENGTH(islot) only if the i-slot is not over-allocated */
00116 
00117                                 /* values depending on ctype */
00118     ans->x = xpt(ctype, x);
00119     ans->stype = stype(ctype, x);
00120     ans->xtype = xtype(ctype);
00121 
00122     /* are the columns sorted (increasing row numbers) ?*/
00123     ans->sorted = check_sorted_chm(ans);
00124     if (!(ans->sorted)) { /* sort columns */
00125         if(sort_in_place) {
00126             if (!cholmod_sort(ans, &c))
00127                 error(_("in_place cholmod_sort returned an error code"));
00128             ans->sorted = 1;
00129         }
00130         else {
00131             CHM_SP tmp = cholmod_copy_sparse(ans, &c);
00132             if (!cholmod_sort(tmp, &c))
00133                 error(_("cholmod_sort returned an error code"));
00134 
00135 #ifdef DEBUG_Matrix
00136             /* This "triggers" exactly for return values of dtCMatrix_sparse_solve():*/
00137             /* Don't want to translate this: want it report */
00138             Rprintf("Note: as_cholmod_sparse() needed cholmod_sort()ing\n");
00139 #endif
00140             chm2Ralloc(ans, tmp);
00141             cholmod_free_sparse(&tmp, &c);
00142         }
00143     }
00144 
00145     if (check_Udiag && ctype % 3 == 2 && (*diag_P(x) == 'U')) { /* diagU2N(.)  "in place" : */
00146         double one[] = {1, 0};
00147         CHM_SP eye = cholmod_speye(ans->nrow, ans->ncol, ans->xtype, &c);
00148         CHM_SP tmp = cholmod_add(ans, eye, one, one, TRUE, TRUE, &c);
00149 
00150         chm2Ralloc(ans, tmp);
00151         cholmod_free_sparse(&tmp, &c);
00152         cholmod_free_sparse(&eye, &c);
00153     } /* else :
00154        * NOTE: if(*diag_P(x) == 'U'), the diagonal is lost (!);
00155        * ---- that may be ok, e.g. if we are just converting from/to Tsparse,
00156        *      but is *not* at all ok, e.g. when used before matrix products */
00157 
00158     return ans;
00159 }
00160 
00176 SEXP chm_sparse_to_SEXP(CHM_SP a, int dofree, int uploT, int Rkind,
00177                         const char* diag, SEXP dn)
00178 {
00179     SEXP ans;
00180     char *cl = "";/* -Wall */
00181     int *dims, nnz;
00182 
00183     PROTECT(dn);  /* dn is usually UNPROTECTed before the call */
00184 
00185                                 /* ensure a is sorted and packed */
00186     if (!a->sorted || !a->packed) cholmod_sort(a, &c);
00187                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00188     switch(a->xtype){
00189     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00190         cl = uploT ? "ntCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "nsCMatrix" : "ngCMatrix");
00191         break;
00192     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00193         switch(Rkind) {
00194         case 0:
00195             cl = uploT ? "dtCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "dsCMatrix" : "dgCMatrix");
00196             break;
00197         case 1:
00198             cl = uploT ? "ltCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "lsCMatrix" : "lgCMatrix");
00199             break;
00200         }
00201         break;
00202     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00203         cl = uploT ? "ztCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "zsCMatrix" : "zgCMatrix");
00204         break;
00205     default: error("unknown xtype in cholmod_sparse object");
00206     }
00207     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00208                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00209     nnz = cholmod_nnz(a, &c);
00210     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00211     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00212     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, a->ncol + 1)),
00213            (int *) a->p, a->ncol + 1);
00214     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, nnz)),
00215            (int *) a->i, nnz);
00216                                 /* copy data slot if present */
00217     if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00218         int i, *m_x;
00219         switch(Rkind) {
00220         case 0:
00221             Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, nnz)),
00222                    (double *) a->x, nnz);
00223             break;
00224         case 1:
00225             m_x = LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, nnz));
00226             for (i=0; i < nnz; i++)
00227                 m_x[i] = (int) ((double *) a->x)[i];
00228             break;
00229         }
00230     }
00231     else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00232         error("complex sparse matrix code not yet written");
00233 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, nnz)), */
00234 /*             (complex *) a->x, nnz); */
00235     if (uploT) {                /* slots for triangularMatrix */
00236         if (a->stype) error("Symmetric and triangular both set");
00237         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym, mkString((uploT > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00238         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_diagSym, mkString(diag));
00239     }
00240     if (a->stype)               /* slot for symmetricMatrix */
00241         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,
00242                  mkString((a->stype > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00243     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_sparse(&a, &c);
00244     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00245     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00246         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00247 
00248     UNPROTECT(2);
00249     return ans;
00250 }
00251 
00267 CHM_TR as_cholmod_triplet(CHM_TR ans, SEXP x, Rboolean check_Udiag)
00268 {
00269     char *valid[] = {"dgTMatrix", "dsTMatrix", "dtTMatrix",
00270                      "lgTMatrix", "lsTMatrix", "ltTMatrix",
00271                      "ngTMatrix", "nsTMatrix", "ntTMatrix",
00272                      "zgTMatrix", "zsTMatrix", "ztTMatrix",
00273                      ""};
00274     int *dims, ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid), m;
00275     SEXP islot;
00276     Rboolean do_Udiag;
00277 
00278     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_triplet");
00279     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_triplet)); /* zero the struct */
00280 
00281     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_INT;   /* characteristics of the system */
00282     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00283     ans->x = ans->z = (void *) NULL;
00284                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */
00285     dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));
00286     ans->nrow = dims[0];
00287     ans->ncol = dims[1];
00288 
00289     do_Udiag = (check_Udiag && ctype % 3 == 2 && (*diag_P(x) == 'U'));
00290 
00291     islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00292     m = LENGTH(islot);
00293     ans->nnz = ans->nzmax = do_Udiag ? m + dims[0] : m;
00294                                 /* slots always present */
00295     ans->i = (void *) INTEGER(islot);
00296     ans->j = (void *) INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym));
00297 
00298     ans->stype = stype(ctype, x);
00299     ans->xtype = xtype(ctype);
00300     ans->x = xpt(ctype, x);
00301 
00302     if(do_Udiag) {  /* Tsparse_diagU2N(.)  [ ./Tsparse.c ]  "in place" : */
00303         int k = m + dims[0];
00304         int *a_i, *a_j;
00305 
00306         /* TODO? instead of reallocating, don't do the 2nd part of AS_CHM_COMMON()
00307          * ---- above, and allocate to correct length + Memcpy() here, as in
00308          * Tsparse_diagU2N() */
00309         if(cholmod_reallocate_triplet((size_t) k, ans, &c))
00310             error(_("as_cholmod_triplet(): could not reallocate for internal diagU2N()"
00311                       ));
00312         a_i = ans->i;
00313         a_j = ans->j;
00314         /* add (@i, @j)[k+m] = k, @x[k+m] = 1.   for k = 0,..,(n-1) */
00315         for(k=0; k < dims[0]; k++) {
00316             a_i[k+m] = k;
00317             a_j[k+m] = k;
00318 
00319             switch(ctype / 3) {
00320             case 0: { /* "d" */
00321                 double *a_x = ans->x;
00322                 a_x[k+m] = 1.;
00323                 break;
00324             }
00325             case 1: { /* "l" */
00326                 int *a_x = ans->x;
00327                 a_x[k+m] = 1;
00328                 break;
00329             }
00330             case 2: /* "n" */
00331                 break;
00332             case 3: { /* "z" */
00333                 double *a_x = ans->x;
00334                 a_x[2*(k+m)  ] = 1.;
00335                 a_x[2*(k+m)+1] = 0.;
00336                 break;
00337             }
00338             }
00339         }
00340 
00341     } /* else :
00342        * NOTE: if(*diag_P(x) == 'U'), the diagonal is lost (!);
00343        * ---- that may be ok, e.g. if we are just converting from/to Tsparse,
00344        *      but is *not* at all ok, e.g. when used before matrix products */
00345 
00346     return ans;
00347 }
00348 
00364 SEXP chm_triplet_to_SEXP(CHM_TR a, int dofree, int uploT, int Rkind,
00365                          const char* diag, SEXP dn)
00366 {
00367     SEXP ans;
00368     char *cl = "";              /* -Wall */
00369     int *dims;
00370 
00371     PROTECT(dn);  /* dn is usually UNPROTECTed before the call */
00372                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00373     switch(a->xtype) {
00374     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00375         cl = uploT ? "ntTMatrix" :
00376             ((a->stype) ? "nsTMatrix" : "ngTMatrix");
00377         break;
00378     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00379         switch(Rkind) {
00380         case 0:
00381             cl = uploT ? "dtTMatrix" :
00382                 ((a->stype) ? "dsTMatrix" : "dgTMatrix");
00383             break;
00384         case 1:
00385             cl = uploT ? "ltTMatrix" :
00386                 ((a->stype) ? "lsTMatrix" : "lgTMatrix");
00387             break;
00388         }
00389         break;
00390     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00391         cl = uploT ? "ztTMatrix" :
00392             ((a->stype) ? "zsTMatrix" : "zgTMatrix");
00393         break;
00394     default: error("unknown xtype in cholmod_triplet object");
00395     }
00396     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00397                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00398     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00399     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00400     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, a->nnz)),
00401            (int *) a->i, a->nnz);
00402     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_jSym, INTSXP, a->nnz)),
00403            (int *) a->j, a->nnz);
00404                                 /* copy data slot if present */
00405     if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00406         int i, *m_x;
00407         switch(Rkind) {
00408         case 0:
00409             Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, a->nnz)),
00410                    (double *) a->x, a->nnz);
00411             break;
00412         case 1:
00413             m_x= LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, a->nnz));
00414             for (i=0; i < a->nnz; i++)
00415                 m_x[i] = (int) ((double *) a->x)[i];
00416 /*          Memcpy(LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, a->nnz)), */
00417 /*                 (int *) a->x, a->nnz); */
00418             break;
00419         }
00420     }
00421     else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00422         error("complex sparse matrix code not yet written");
00423 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, a->nnz)), */
00424 /*             (complex *) a->x, a->nz); */
00425     if (uploT) {                /* slots for triangularMatrix */
00426         if (a->stype) error("Symmetric and triangular both set");
00427         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym, mkString((uploT > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00428         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_diagSym, mkString(diag));
00429     }
00430                                 /* set symmetry attributes */
00431     if (a->stype)
00432         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,
00433                  mkString((a->stype > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00434     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_triplet(&a, &c);
00435     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00436     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00437         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00438     UNPROTECT(2);
00439     return ans;
00440 }
00441 
00455 CHM_DN as_cholmod_dense(CHM_DN ans, SEXP x)
00456 {
00457 #define _AS_cholmod_dense_1                                             \
00458     char *valid[] = {"dmatrix", "dgeMatrix",                            \
00459                      "lmatrix", "lgeMatrix",                            \
00460                      "nmatrix", "ngeMatrix",                            \
00461                      "zmatrix", "zgeMatrix", ""};                       \
00462     int dims[2], ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid), nprot = 0; \
00463                                                                         \
00464     if (ctype < 0) {            /* not a classed matrix */              \
00465         if (isMatrix(x)) Memcpy(dims, INTEGER(getAttrib(x, R_DimSymbol)), 2); \
00466         else {dims[0] = LENGTH(x); dims[1] = 1;}                        \
00467         if (isInteger(x)) {                                             \
00468             x = PROTECT(coerceVector(x, REALSXP));                      \
00469             nprot++;                                                    \
00470         }                                                               \
00471         ctype = (isReal(x) ? 0 :                                        \
00472                  (isLogical(x) ? 2 : /* logical -> default to "l", not "n" */ \
00473                   (isComplex(x) ? 6 : -1)));                            \
00474     } else Memcpy(dims, INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)), 2);        \
00475     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_dense");\
00476     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_dense)); /* zero the struct */        \
00477                                                                         \
00478     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE; /* characteristics of the system */    \
00479     ans->x = ans->z = (void *) NULL;                                    \
00480                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */              \
00481     ans->d = ans->nrow = dims[0];                                       \
00482     ans->ncol = dims[1];                                                \
00483     ans->nzmax = dims[0] * dims[1];                                     \
00484                                 /* set the xtype and any elements */    \
00485     switch(ctype / 2) {                                                 \
00486     case 0: /* "d" */                                                   \
00487         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;                                      \
00488         ans->x = (void *) REAL((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x); \
00489         break
00490 
00491     _AS_cholmod_dense_1;
00492 
00493     case 1: /* "l" */
00494         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00495         ans->x =
00496             (void *) REAL(coerceVector((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x,
00497                                        REALSXP));
00498         break;
00499     case 2: /* "n" */
00500         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00501         ans->x = (void *) LOGICAL((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x);
00502         break;
00503 
00504 #define _AS_cholmod_dense_2                                             \
00505     case 3: /* "z" */                                                   \
00506         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_COMPLEX;                                   \
00507         ans->x = (void *) COMPLEX((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x); \
00508         break;                                                          \
00509     }                                                                   \
00510     UNPROTECT(nprot);                                                   \
00511     return ans
00512 
00513     _AS_cholmod_dense_2;
00514 }
00515 
00516 /* version of as_cholmod_dense() that produces a cholmod_dense matrix
00517  * with REAL 'x' slot -- i.e. treats "nMatrix" as "lMatrix" -- as only difference;
00518  * Not just via a flag in as_cholmod_dense() since that has fixed API */
00519 CHM_DN as_cholmod_x_dense(cholmod_dense *ans, SEXP x)
00520 {
00521     _AS_cholmod_dense_1;
00522 
00523     case 1: /* "l" */
00524     case 2: /* "n" (no NA in 'x', but *has* 'x' slot => treat as "l" */
00525         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00526         ans->x =
00527             (void *) REAL(coerceVector((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x,
00528                                        REALSXP));
00529         break;
00530 
00531     _AS_cholmod_dense_2;
00532 }
00533 
00534 #undef _AS_cholmod_dense_1
00535 #undef _AS_cholmod_dense_2
00536 
00537 void R_cholmod_error(int status, char *file, int line, char *message)
00538 {
00539     error(_("Cholmod error '%s' at file:%s, line %d"), message, file, line);
00540 }
00541 
00542 /* just to get 'int' instead of 'void' as required by CHOLMOD's print_function */
00543 static
00544 int R_cholmod_printf(const char* fmt, ...)
00545 {
00546     va_list(ap);
00547 
00548     va_start(ap, fmt);
00549     Rprintf((char *)fmt, ap);
00550     va_end(ap);
00551     return 0;
00552 }
00553 
00562 int R_cholmod_start(CHM_CM c)
00563 {
00564     int res;
00565     if (!(res = cholmod_start(c)))
00566         error(_("Unable to initialize cholmod: error code %d"), res);
00567     c->print_function = R_cholmod_printf; /* Rprintf gives warning */
00568     /* Since we provide an error handler, it may not be a good idea to allow CHOLMOD printing,
00569      * because that's not easily suppressed on the R level :
00570      * Hence consider, at least temporarily *  c->print_function = NULL; */
00571     c->error_handler = R_cholmod_error;
00572     return TRUE;
00573 }
00574 
00587 /* FIXME: should also have args  (int uploST, char *diag) */
00588 
00589 SEXP chm_dense_to_SEXP(CHM_DN a, int dofree, int Rkind, SEXP dn)
00590 {
00591     SEXP ans;
00592     char *cl = ""; /* -Wall */
00593     int *dims, ntot;
00594 
00595     PROTECT(dn); /* << (why? -- just cut&paste from chm_dense_to_mat.. below*/
00596 
00597     switch(a->xtype) {          /* determine the class of the result */
00598 /* CHOLMOD_PATTERN never happens because cholmod_dense can't :
00599  *     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00600  *      cl = "ngeMatrix"; break;
00601  */
00602     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00603         switch(Rkind) { /* -1: special for this function! */
00604         case -1: cl = "ngeMatrix"; break;
00605         case 0:  cl = "dgeMatrix"; break;
00606         case 1:  cl = "lgeMatrix"; break;
00607         default: error("unknown 'Rkind'");
00608         }
00609         break;
00610     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00611         cl = "zgeMatrix"; break;
00612     default:
00613         error("unknown xtype");
00614     }
00615 
00616     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00617                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00618     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00619     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00620     ntot = dims[0] * dims[1];
00621     if (a->d == a->nrow) {      /* copy data slot -- always present in dense(!) */
00622         if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00623             int i, *m_x;
00624             switch(Rkind) {
00625             case 0:
00626                 Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, ntot)),
00627                        (double *) a->x, ntot);
00628                 break;
00629             case -1: /* nge*/
00630             case 1:  /* lge*/
00631                 m_x = LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, ntot));
00632                 for (i=0; i < ntot; i++)
00633                     m_x[i] = (int) ((double *) a->x)[i];
00634 /*              Memcpy(LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, ntot)), */
00635 /*                     (int *) a->x, ntot); */
00636                 break;
00637             }
00638         }
00639         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00640             error("complex sparse matrix code not yet written");
00641 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, ntot)), */
00642 /*             (complex *) a->x, ntot); */
00643     } else error("code for cholmod_dense with holes not yet written");
00644 
00645     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_dense(&a, &c);
00646     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00647     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00648         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00649     UNPROTECT(2);
00650     return ans;
00651 }
00652 
00663 SEXP chm_dense_to_matrix(CHM_DN a, int dofree, SEXP dn)
00664 {
00665     SEXP ans;
00666     SEXPTYPE typ;
00667 
00668     PROTECT(dn);
00669                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00670     typ = (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? LGLSXP :
00671         ((a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) ? REALSXP :
00672          ((a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX) ? CPLXSXP : NILSXP));
00673     if (typ == NILSXP) error("unknown xtype");
00674 
00675     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(typ, a->nrow, a->ncol));
00676     if (a->d == a->nrow) {      /* copy data slot if present */
00677         if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL)
00678             Memcpy(REAL(ans), (double *) a->x, a->nrow * a->ncol);
00679         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00680             error("complex sparse matrix code not yet written");
00681         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_PATTERN)
00682             error("don't know if a dense pattern matrix makes sense");
00683 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, a->nnz)), */
00684 /*             (complex *) a->x, a->nz); */
00685     } else error("code for cholmod_dense with holes not yet written");
00686 
00687     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_dense(&a, &c);
00688     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00689     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00690         setAttrib(ans, R_DimNamesSymbol, duplicate(dn));
00691     UNPROTECT(2);
00692     return ans;
00693 }
00694 
00695 CHM_DN numeric_as_chm_dense(CHM_DN ans, double *v, int nr, int nc)
00696 {
00697     ans->d = ans->nrow = nr;
00698     ans->ncol = nc;
00699     ans->nzmax = nr * nc;
00700     ans->x = (void *) v;
00701     ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00702     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00703     return ans;
00704 }
00705 
00719 CHM_FR as_cholmod_factor(CHM_FR ans, SEXP x)
00720 {
00721     char *valid[] = {"dCHMsuper", "dCHMsimpl", "nCHMsuper", "nCHMsimpl", ""};
00722     int *type = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("type"))),
00723         ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid);
00724     SEXP tmp;
00725 
00726     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_factor");
00727     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_factor)); /* zero the struct */
00728 
00729     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_INT;   /* characteristics of the system */
00730     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00731     ans->z = (void *) NULL;
00732     ans->xtype = (ctype < 2) ? CHOLMOD_REAL : CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00733 
00734     ans->ordering = type[0];    /* unravel the type */
00735     ans->is_ll = (type[1] ? 1 : 0);
00736     ans->is_super = (type[2] ? 1 : 0);
00737     ans->is_monotonic = (type[3] ? 1 : 0);
00738                                 /* check for consistency */
00739     if ((!(ans->is_ll)) && ans->is_super)
00740         error(_("Supernodal LDL' decomposition not available"));
00741     if ((!type[2]) ^ (ctype % 2))
00742         error(_("Supernodal/simplicial class inconsistent with type flags"));
00743                                 /* slots always present */
00744     tmp = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_permSym);
00745     ans->minor = ans->n = LENGTH(tmp); ans->Perm = INTEGER(tmp);
00746     ans->ColCount = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("colcount")));
00747     ans->z = ans->x = (void *) NULL;
00748     if (ctype < 2) {
00749         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym);
00750         ans->x = REAL(tmp);
00751     }
00752     if (ans->is_super) {        /* supernodal factorization */
00753         ans->xsize = LENGTH(tmp);
00754         ans->maxcsize = type[4]; ans->maxesize = type[5];
00755         ans->i = (int*)NULL;
00756         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("super"));
00757         ans->nsuper = LENGTH(tmp) - 1; ans->super = INTEGER(tmp);
00758         /* Move these checks to the CHMfactor_validate function */
00759         if (ans->nsuper < 1)
00760             error(_("Number of supernodes must be positive when is_super is TRUE"));
00761         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("pi"));
00762         if (LENGTH(tmp) != ans->nsuper + 1)
00763             error(_("Lengths of super and pi must be equal"));
00764         ans->pi = INTEGER(tmp);
00765         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("px"));
00766         if (LENGTH(tmp) != ans->nsuper + 1)
00767             error(_("Lengths of super and px must be equal"));
00768         ans->px = INTEGER(tmp);
00769         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("s"));
00770         ans->ssize = LENGTH(tmp); ans->s = INTEGER(tmp);
00771     } else {
00772         ans->nzmax = LENGTH(tmp);
00773         ans->p = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym));
00774         ans->i = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym));
00775         ans->nz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("nz")));
00776         ans->next = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("nxt")));
00777         ans->prev = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("prv")));
00778     }
00779     if (!cholmod_check_factor(ans, &c))
00780         error(_("failure in as_cholmod_factor"));
00781     return ans;
00782 }
00783 
00793 SEXP chm_factor_to_SEXP(CHM_FR f, int dofree)
00794 {
00795     SEXP ans;
00796     int *dims, *type;
00797     char *class = (char*) NULL; /* -Wall */
00798 
00799     switch(f->xtype) {
00800     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00801         class = f->is_super ? "dCHMsuper" : "dCHMsimpl";
00802         break;
00803     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00804         class = f->is_super ? "nCHMsuper" : "nCHMsimpl";
00805         break;
00806     default:
00807         error(_("f->xtype of %d not recognized"), f->xtype);
00808     }
00809     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(class)));
00810     if (f->minor < f->n)
00811         error(_("CHOLMOD factorization was unsuccessful"));
00812     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00813     dims[0] = dims[1] = f->n;
00814                                 /* copy component of known length */
00815     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_permSym, INTSXP, f->n)),
00816            (int*)f->Perm, f->n);
00817     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("colcount"), INTSXP, f->n)),
00818            (int*)f->ColCount, f->n);
00819     type = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("type"), INTSXP, f->is_super ? 6 : 4));
00820     type[0] = f->ordering; type[1] = f->is_ll;
00821     type[2] = f->is_super; type[3] = f->is_monotonic;
00822     if (f->is_super) {
00823         type[4] = f->maxcsize; type[5] = f->maxesize;
00824         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("super"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00825                (int*)f->super, f->nsuper+1);
00826         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("pi"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00827                (int*)f->pi, f->nsuper + 1);
00828         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("px"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00829                (int*)f->px, f->nsuper + 1);
00830         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("s"), INTSXP, f->ssize)),
00831                (int*)f->s, f->ssize);
00832         Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, f->xsize)),
00833                (double*)f->x, f->xsize);
00834     } else {
00835         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, f->nzmax)),
00836                (int*)f->i, f->nzmax);
00837         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, f->n + 1)),
00838                (int*)f->p, f->n + 1);
00839         Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, f->nzmax)),
00840                (double*)f->x, f->nzmax);
00841         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("nz"), INTSXP, f->n)),
00842                (int*)f->nz, f->n);
00843         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("nxt"), INTSXP, f->n + 2)),
00844                (int*)f->next, f->n + 2);
00845         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("prv"), INTSXP, f->n + 2)),
00846                (int*)f->prev, f->n + 2);
00847 
00848     }
00849     if(dofree) {
00850         if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_factor(&f, &c);
00851         else /* dofree < 0 */ Free(f);
00852     }
00853     UNPROTECT(1);
00854     return ans;
00855 }
00856 
00868 void chm_diagN2U(CHM_SP chx, int uploT, Rboolean do_realloc)
00869 {
00870     int i, n = chx->nrow, nnz = (int)cholmod_nnz(chx, &c),
00871         n_nnz = nnz - n, /* the new nnz : we will have removed  n entries */
00872         i_to = 0, i_from = 0;
00873 
00874     if(chx->ncol != n)
00875         error(_("chm_diagN2U(<non-square matrix>): nrow=%d, ncol=%d"),
00876               n, chx->ncol);
00877 
00878     if (!chx->sorted || !chx->packed) cholmod_sort(chx, &c);
00879                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */
00880 
00881 #define _i(I) (   (int*) chx->i)[I]
00882 #define _x(I) ((double*) chx->x)[I]
00883 #define _p(I) (   (int*) chx->p)[I]
00884 
00885     /* work by copying from i_from to i_to ==> MUST i_to <= i_from */
00886 
00887     if(uploT == 1) { /* "U" : upper triangular */
00888 
00889         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* looking at i-th column */
00890             int j, n_i = _p(i+1) - _p(i); /* = #{entries} in this column */
00891 
00892             /* 1) copy all but the last _above-diagonal_ column-entries: */
00893             for(j = 1; j < n_i; j++, i_to++, i_from++) {
00894                 _i(i_to) = _i(i_from);
00895                 _x(i_to) = _x(i_from);
00896             }
00897 
00898             /* 2) drop the last column-entry == diagonal entry */
00899             i_from++;
00900         }
00901     }
00902     else if(uploT == -1) { /* "L" : lower triangular */
00903 
00904         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* looking at i-th column */
00905             int j, n_i = _p(i+1) - _p(i); /* = #{entries} in this column */
00906 
00907             /* 1) drop the first column-entry == diagonal entry */
00908             i_from++;
00909 
00910             /* 2) copy the other _below-diagonal_ column-entries: */
00911             for(j = 1; j < n_i; j++, i_to++, i_from++) {
00912                 _i(i_to) = _i(i_from);
00913                 _x(i_to) = _x(i_from);
00914             }
00915         }
00916     }
00917     else {
00918         error(_("chm_diagN2U(x, uploT = %d): uploT should be +- 1"), uploT);
00919     }
00920 
00921     /* the column pointers are modified the same in both cases :*/
00922     for(i=1; i <= n; i++)
00923         _p(i) -= i;
00924 
00925 #undef _i
00926 #undef _x
00927 #undef _p
00928 
00929     if(do_realloc) /* shorten (i- and x-slots from nnz to n_nnz */
00930         cholmod_reallocate_sparse(n_nnz, chx, &c);
00931     return;
00932 }

00938     return ScalarLogical(1);
00939 }

00942 {
